score.description: Overall plan quality score (1-10). Sum of breakdown categories.

completeness.description: Does the plan cover all requirements? 0=missing major pieces, 1=partial, 2=thorough

correctness.description: Is the approach technically sound? 0=flawed, 1=mostly correct, 2=solid

sequencing.description: Are steps in the right order with dependencies respected? 0=broken, 1=mostly, 2=logical

risk_awareness.description: Does the plan identify risks and edge cases? 0=ignores risks, 1=some, 2=thorough

clarity.description: Is the plan clear and actionable? 0=vague, 1=ok, 2=precise and actionable

weaknesses.description: 2-5 specific issues that lower the score. Reference step numbers.
